Package index

Client

Functions for initializing Zotero API client

zotero_client()
Zotero API Client

Items

Functions for managing items

get_items()
Get items from Zotero library
item()
Get a specific item by key
children()
Get child items of a specific item
trash()
Get items in trash
num_top_items()
Get total number of top-level items in the library
num_all_items()
Get total number of all items in the library

Collections

Functions for managing collections

create_collection()
Create a new collection in Zotero library
delete_collection()
Delete a collection from Zotero library
get_all_collections()
Get all collections in the library
get_collection()
Get a specific collection from Zotero library
get_collection_items_tags()
Get tags for items in a collection
get_collection_items_top_tags()
Get tags for top-level items in a collection
get_collection_tags()
Get tags within a specific collection
get_collection_versions()
Get versions of collections
get_collections()
Get collections from Zotero library
get_collections_top()
Get top-level collections from Zotero library
get_subcollections()
Get subcollections of a specific collection

Tags

Functions for managing tags

get_tag()
Get tags matching a specific name
get_tags()
Get all tags from Zotero library
get_collection_items_tags()
Get tags for items in a collection
get_collection_items_top_tags()
Get tags for top-level items in a collection
get_collection_tags()
Get tags within a specific collection
get_item_tags()
Get tags for a specific item
get_items_tags()
Get all item tags with filtering options
get_items_top_tags()
Get tags for top-level items
get_items_trash_tags()
Get tags for items in trash
get_publications_tags()
Get tags for items in My Publications

Files & Attachments

Functions for managing files and attachments

get_file()
Get file from a specific item
download_file()
Download file attachment to disk
create_attachment()
Create file attachment

Search

Functions for managing saved searches

get_search()
Get a specific saved search from Zotero library
get_searches()
Get all saved searches from Zotero library
create_search()
Create a new saved search in Zotero library
delete_search()
Delete a saved search from Zotero library

Syncing & Versions

Functions for syncing and version control

get_item_versions()
Get versions of items
get_collection_versions()
Get versions of collections
get_last_modified_version()
Get the last modified version of the library
get_deleted()
Get deleted content since a specific version
update_item_version()
Update an item with version check
update_items_version()
Update multiple items with version check

Groups & Publications

Functions for accessing groups and publications

get_groups()
Get user groups
get_publications()
Get items from My Publications

Batch Operations

Functions for batch operations

get_item_subset()
Get a subset of items by their keys
get_all_items()
Get all items in the library
get_all_collections()
Get all collections in the library
